name: RPG Maker MV - Dragons Den Resource Pack
detailed_description:
Devious servants of the dragon lord seek to awaken the beast! This giant pack of art and audio assets gives you the tools to build an adventure in the Dragon's Den. Music, SFX, battlers (including a giant dragon!), backgrounds, character sprites and tileset art all build the dark and dangerous atmosphere in this resource pack from creator Joel Steudler.

Features:

ART ASSETS

- The dragon lord and servants!
-- Dragon Lord (red, green and blue variant)
-- Dragon Priest (red, green and blue variant)
-- Dragon Shaman (red and albino, with and without magical energy)
-- Dragon Warrior (red, green, and blue variant)
-- Dragon Whelp (red, green and blue variant)
-- Dragon Egg (intact and cracked open)

- Battle Backgrounds x9
-- Dark cave (red rock, grey stone, and ice)
-- Cavern with rock formations (red rock, grey stone, and ice)
-- Dragon Mountain top half (red rock, grey stone, and ice)

- Character Sprites 4-directional
-- Dragon Priest (red, green and blue variant)
-- Dragon Warrior (red, green and blue variant)
-- Dragon Shaman (red and albino variant)

- faceset with dragon and servants
- Dungeon_A2 tileset
- BONUS tileset decorations
- formatted for RPG Maker MV


AUDIO ASSETS

- 10 music tracks suitable for battle and draconic themes!
- 20 dragon sounds! Roars, growls, and fire breath!
- 12 lines of dangerous dragon servant dialogue to taunt your players.
- .ogg and .m4a formats included for audio assets.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV projects.
